Submodules¶

This project use two main Abstract classes namely: Model class (defined in Models Module) and Augmentation class (defined in Transforms Module).

Models Module¶

class src.models.Model(*network_config)¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Creates and adds models. Requirment: The network needs to be fitted in four main funtions: run, initialize, deinitialize, and draw.

abstract classmethod deinitialize()¶
abstract classmethod draw()¶
abstract classmethod initialize(*kwargs)¶
abstract classmethod run(input)¶
class src.models.Segmentation(*network_config)¶

Bases: src.models.Model

Segmentation Model that inhertes the Model class It specifies its four main functions: run, initialize, deinitialize, and draw.

src.transforms.dim_intensity(image, factor, seed=- 1)¶

Dims the intensity of the image by the give factor/range of factor.

|Parameters:

|image (numpy array): The original input image |factor (float or tuple): The diming factor (if float) or the dimimg factor range (if tuple) |seed (int or 1-d array_like): Seed for RandomState. Must be convertible to 32 bit unsigned integers.

|Returns:

|image (numpy array): The dimed image

src.transforms.letterbox_image(image, size)¶

Resize image with unchanged aspect ratio using padding. This function replaces “letterbox” and enforces non-rectangle static inferencing only
